mapper.select: select interest, e_mail from User_Interest_list natural join Interest_list where e_mail = #{email}
mapper.update: update User set e_mail = #{email}, name = #{name}, say = #{say}, photo = #{photo}, honor = #{honor}, dishonor = #{dishonor} where e_mail = #{email}
mapper.select: select MainTopic.mt_id from MainTopic join User on User.e_mail = MainTopic.e_mail where MainTopic.m_close = "n" and MainTopic.e_mail = #{e_mail}
